mapper.update: update tbl_course set writer = #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, review = #{review,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration_start = #{duration_start,jdbcType=DATE}, duration_end = #{duration_end,jdbcType=DATE}, modify_date = sysdate where seq = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}
